title: i need to report a player but there is no option.
body: Yea i need to report someone but it wasnt available in the client! Help!

replies.body:
Submit a support ticket here: 

    https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Make sure to select “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and category “Games and Features > General Questions”.

give them a brief explanation of the reason why as well. Also submitting a ticket does not have any higher chance of getting the player punished as opposed to a normal in-game report.
Thanks but as I said to the red, I don;t think going this method will help in getting this person dealt with.

[**Submitting a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this is the best option, as *Wolfess* mentioned. Did this not happen in-game, or were you simply not seeing a report option in the post-game lobby?
I don't really think going to support is actually going to help me in getting this person reported and dealt with.
